an5.161:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, aghatapativinaya yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aghato sabbaso pativinetabbo.
an5.161:1.3: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale aghato jayetha, metta tasmim puggale bhavetabba;
an5.161:1.5: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale aghato jayetha, karuna tasmim puggale bhavetabba;
an5.161:1.7: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale aghato jayetha, upekkha tasmim puggale bhavetabba;
an5.161:1.9: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale aghato jayetha, asatiamanasikaro tasmim puggale apajjitabbo;
an5.161:1.11: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale aghato jayetha, kammassakata tasmim puggale adhitthatabba:
an5.161:1.13: yam kammam karissati kalyanam va papakam va tassa dayado bhavissati’ti;
an5.161:1.15: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca aghatapativinaya, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aghato sabbaso pativinetabbo”ti.
